backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two HistoryPage updates with associated files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML scaffold loading the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with main site routes and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout component with navigation, outlet region, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus using TanStack Router links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for potential backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining copper-themed OKLCH light and dark palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Displays a hero section and detailed cards describing each Brotherhood division with icons, images, and lore text.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Renders a multi-section narrative history using structured data and card-like layout for each story chapter.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero banner, navigation buttons, and feature cards linking to ranks, divisions, and lore.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a detailed photo card of T-10 power armor with accessory images.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Presents the Brotherhood's rank hierarchy with icons and descriptive cards for leadership and other rank groups.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Lists armor and uniform variants by rank using cards and bullet points detailing equipment features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests for updating the History page.
